#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

long long balanced[100001];
long long prime[100001];
long long sieve[100001];

int main()
{

   long i,j,count=0,index=0;

   sieve[0]=1;

   sieve[1]=1;

   for(i=2;i<=100000;i++)
   {

     if(sieve[i]==0) prime[count++]=i;

     for(j=2;j*i<=100000;j++)
     sieve[j*i]=1;

   }

   prime[count]=-1;

   for(i=0;prime[i]!=-1;i++)
   {

     if(i>0 && i<count-1)
     {

       if(2*prime[i]==prime[i-1]+prime[i+1])
       {

        balanced[index++]=prime[i];

       }
     }

   }



   long long n;

   cin>>n;

   while(n--)
   {

     cin>>index;

     cout<<balanced[index-1]<<endl;

   }

   return 0;

}
